io.spine.web.future

Class FutureObserver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.web.future.FutureObserver<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<T>

    public final class FutureObserver<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<T>
    A stream observer which can provide a CompletableFuture view on the stream.

    This implementation works only with the unary gRPC calls, i.e. FutureObserver.onNext(Object) cannot be called more then once.

    • Method Detail

      • withDefault

        public static <T> FutureObserver<T> withDefault(T defaultValue)
        Creates a new instance of FutureObserver with the given defaultValue.

        The default value is used only if the FutureObserver.onNext(Object) method is never invoked and the stream is completed. In such case, the future view is completed with the given value.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the observed stream
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - the default value to complete the future with
        Returns:
        new FutureObserver

      • create

        public static <T> FutureObserver<T> create()
        Creates a new instance of FutureObserver.

        In case if the stream is completed with no value, the future view completed with null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the observed stream
        Returns:
        new FutureObserver
        See Also:
        FutureObserver.withDefault(Object)

      • onNext

        public void onNext(T value)

      • onCompleted

        public void onCompleted()
        Specified by:
        onCompleted in interface io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<T>

      • toFuture

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> toFuture()
        Retrieves the future view on this observer result.

        The future is completed when:

        1. the element of the unary stream arrives via FutureObserver.onNext(Object);
        2. the stream is completed with no data;
        3. the stream is completed with an error; in this case, the future is obtruded with the error from the stream.
        Returns:
        the future view on this observer
